with a 168-116 rout of the Seattle SuperSonics on Sunday night. Denver set a franchise record for most points in a regulation game and fell just 16 points shy of the franchise record for points in a game. There was no way that I couldn't enjoy the game, not from the way we played offensively, Nuggets coach George Karl said. The Nuggets had eight players score in double figures, led by Carmelo Anthony 's 26 and Allen Iverson 's 24. Kenyon Martin had 23 points and Marcus Camby had a triple-double with 13 points, 15 rebounds
